sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Officials in Germany and Denmark have issued a maritime warning following leaks in both the Nord Stream 1 and 2 pipelines in the Baltic Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: As Ukraine's counter-offensive continues in the northeast of the country, defending troops find more mass graves and destruction following the withdrawal of Russian troops.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: 1,200 people were arrested across Iran on Monday as demonstrators continue to denounce the death of 22-year-old Massa Amani.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: German and Danish authorities are investigating if a mysterious fall in pressure and leaks in the Nord Stream pipelines 1 and 2 were a possible attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Leaks were first reported in Danish and Swedish waters on Monday from the cancelled Nord Stream 2 pipeline.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Later, a loss of pressure was detected in the first one.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The German daily Tagesspiegel, citing federal sources, said the events were unlikely to be a coincidence and were being considered as potential acts of sabotage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Neither pipeline is delivering gas from Russia to Germany at the moment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Nord Stream 2 was cancelled after construction was complete and Moscow halted supplies through Nord Stream 1 earlier this month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: However, both pipelines were filled with gas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Dutch Maritime Authority has issued a navigation warning as the spill could pose a danger to ships in the area and have established a five nautical mile perimeter around the pipeline.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The owners of Nord Stream say it is impossible to say when the pipelines will be operational again.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Yet more destruction in eastern Ukraine as Russia's military continues its assault.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: At least four people have been injured in a strike on a residential area in Kramatorsk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: However, Ukrainian forces have regained thousands of square kilometres in the northeast as their counter-offensive continues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The key town of Kopench, which Moscow used to resupply its forces deployed further south, has been recaptured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But a Russian-controlled strip on the banks of the Oskil River has blocked defending troops from advancing towards the Luhansk region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In his nightly address, President Vladimir Zelensky called Putin's partial mobilization order an attempt to provide commanders with a constant stream of cannon fodder.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Despite the obvious senselessness of the war for Russia and the occupiers' lack of initiative, the commanders with the Russian military still drive them to their death. Constant attempts by Russia's offensive within the Donetsk region will surely be described in history as the murder of Russia's own soldiers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Officials in Kiev are investigating a suspected mass burial site feared to hold scores of bodies outside of Kozachy-Lopan in the Kharkiv region following the withdrawal of Russian troops.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This comes as two new mass graves were found in the town of Izum.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Four hundred bodies have already been exhumed from a forest in the area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Dramatic scenes outside a school in central Russia as dozens of students run from the building where a gunman had opened fire, killing at least 17 people, including 11 children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Investigators say the man used two pistols and had a large supply of ammunition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: One student who was evacuated from the building described how she hid under the school desk and sat quietly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: She said everyone's legs were shaking.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russian authorities have identified the gunman who killed himself after the attack as a 34-year-old former graduate of the school.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: They said he was wearing a black T-shirt bearing Nazi symbols and was said to be registered as a patient at a psychiatric facility.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: No details about his motives have been released.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov described the attack as a terrorist incident and said President Vladimir Putin deeply mourned the deaths.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.sentence: A 58-year-old man died after a huge storm caused massive flooding in the Spanish region of Murcia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The storm hammered the region with lightning, strong winds and record-breaking rain, up to 40.6 millimetres falling in just 10 minutes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Demonstrators in Iran continue to decry the death of 22-year-old Masa Amini, who died more than a week ago despite a backlash from state police. As students rallied for the release of a protester in Tehran on Monday, officials say more than 41 people have been killed in the clashes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But NGOs say at least 76 people, including four children, have been killed by state forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This comes as 1,200 more protesters were arrested in major cities across the country on Monday. Iranians living in Istanbul also gathered in front of the Iranian consulate to protest against police violence and internet blackouts back home.

sentences.sentence: Moving west to Paris, riot police were seen using tear gas to push back demonstrators as they tried to march in the Iranian embassy on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Amini was detained in Tehran by the Morality Police for not wearing the hijab correctly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: While police maintain she died of a heart attack, her family and eyewitnesses say she was beaten and that her body showed signs of torture.

sentences.sentence: U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris was among mourners at the controversial state funeral

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: of the assassinated Japanese former Prime Minister Shinzo Abe this Tuesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Aki Abe, the wife of the late politician, carried her husband's ashes in front of the watchful eyes of 4,300 attendees.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Abe was shot during a campaign speech back in July, shocking a nation where gun violence is extremely rare.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Hours before the ceremony, hundreds of grievers lined up for hours to leave flowers and pay their final respects.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But not everyone was thrilled.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: At a time of soaring inflation, thousands of protesters took to the streets of the capital to denounce a funeral that will cost Japanese taxpayers over 12 million euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The late leader was also disliked for his unpopular policies and his ties to the South Korean Unification Church, which has faced major backlash for its excessive fundraising practices.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On display at the newly refurbished CIA museum in Virginia, these exhibits are unfortunately closed to the public. Access is usually limited to agency employees and foreign officials and the number of annual visitors to the museum is kept top secret. But the intelligence service has allowed journalists to tour the museum ahead of the agency's 75th anniversary as part of a broader effort to showcase its history and achievements. Boasting a collection of spy gadgets, specialised weaponry and espionage memorabilia, most of the displays took years or even decades to declassify.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Visitors learned the miniature replica of the Abbottabad compound was used to carefully plan the assassination of Al Qaeda founder Osama bin Laden, the mastermind behind the 9-11 terror attacks in New York.
